Articles.Content:
I dont know if it was during timewarp only, but the lag was strange in a way that everything stopped - yet continued.

And when it ended I was already on my way out of the SOI (warpx10000 I think).

Has it always been this way? Never noticed - maybe because "Kalarmclock" slowed the warp down for me ... hm ...

I think there have been a few other threads about this. It appears to have only begun affecting a lot of people in the most recent update(s), so it may be 0.21 related. AFAIK, there's no fix, and it's not always an issue. I would suspect, but have no real idea(!), that it has something to do with the new asset handling (pFrame??).

I'm probably just making that last bit up!
